title: Alpha client stuck on "Aunthenticating", legacy client fails to update

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me.

* [Download](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and run the HRT.
* Select '**Gather System & LoL Logs**'
* Locate the **LoL Logs.zip** generated to your desktop and upload the file to a host of your choice, reply with a link to this file here.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=rRWEZkiz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-12T08:38:02.326+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Could you please do the following for me.
> 
> * [Download](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and run the HRT.
> * Select '**Gather System & LoL Logs**'
> * Locate the **LoL Logs.zip** generated to your desktop and upload the file to a host of your choice, reply with a link to this file here.

i have found the solution myself :)
i had the language set to korean in the locale file as ko_KR, but after changing it to en_AU it's working fine now
